title: Rioter, plz answer my question :-)
body:
After look at the end of season information I have a question.

Will the BE needed to get mastery 6/7 increase by 6.5 as well or will it stay the same? Or do you not know yet?

replies.body: AFAIK at this moment, those costs will remain the same. I don't have all the details on those conversions just yet, so we'll both have to wait for the final word!
